title: Crime Alert 03.27.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 03.27.19
description:
Texas school librarian found shot dead in her kitchen. Man allegedly taunts a missing baby’s mother with false clues about the child’s whereabouts. Charges for celebrity lawyer after he tries to extort $20 million from Nike. 


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
